title: Huawei Mate 10 renders show the return of the home button | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Other specifications are open to further speculation, but it would be a safebet to predict the Mate 10 will have Huawei’s latest Kirin 970 system-on-a-chip at its heart paired with 6GB of RAM and on board storage starting at64GB; the renders suggest that there’s no microSD slot to allow for morestorage space to be added.The [Huawei Mate 10 is set to be officially revealed on October16](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-mate-10-3260270) in Munich,Germany.**Related:[Samsung Galaxy Note 8 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-note-8)****What would you like to see from the Mate 10? let us know on Facebook ortweet @TrustedReviews.**
